item.title: Gateway Client Settings
item.description: Settings on this page determine how a node’s client connection to gateway peers behave. Settings Gateway Client settings Field Name Description Connectivity to Public Gateways Options are Allowed or Denied. If set to Denied this will cause the node to not attempt connections to public gateways. This might be desired if you want the node to only connect to configured private gateways. Or if you have private gateways that do not need to connect to the public gateways in your organization.

item.title: Gateway Server Settings
item.description: Gateways servers are nodes that are configured to receive connections from other Trustgrid nodes (clients). These are the only nodes that need to have ports open and listening on the internet or WAN network.
